message.body: Hey, do you know where Gouda is from? Like our friend Gouda. Where is he from?
I have no idea. Egypt?
How exactly do I get there?
It's basically like you're walking from west 72nd to east 72nd. Ya feel me? but you don't exit the park and the place where it's held is called Rumsey's
playfield on the central park map so just ask/look on a map for that. Also, where are you currently?
Thanks! Still on the bus. Close to the city though
Hey, so let me know when you're at the crib. I recommend coming as soon as possible because the line is getting a little hefty.
Ok I just got home. Gotta shower and eat. I'll be there soon!
Hurry dear! You should go around the line, if you can and you may be able to just squeeze in and stand behind me.
Hmmm okay. I don't think I'm going to be much earlier than 5:30
Well. Try really hard to.
Because I'm bored.
Wear the banana shirt!
I don't have it!
:'( where are you now?
I'm eating with my family at home, then I'm coming straight there
On my way now!
Run, William, run!
How are you doing in the line?
I'm way far away from the front. We are moving slowly
...About how many people in front of you?
A lot...like a few hundred
Man, I don't want to be that guy...that suggests that this may be a bad idea. But I'll wait for you if you think it's worth it.
Please wait for me, I'm almost to the front. Is it already really too crowded
I don't think it's all crowded yet.
I will wait if you want me to.
I'm almost there. We will push to the front of the crowd
I'm in the front bracket of the line now
